Package fr.jaimys.scabits

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountActivity
    Activity that launch the timer.
    ActivityCheck
    Class that contains the data collection, time and informations on activities.
    DailyActivities
    Class that contains number of occurrence for each activity stored.
    DataHabits
    Class that contains some of ActivityCheck Object informations but reorganized.
    DataHabitsAdapter
    Class that contains the list of DataHabits and make the correspondance with the view and the list.
    DataHabitsAdapter.DataHabitsViewHolder
    Class that contains informations on DataHabits, it makes the correspondance with the view and the list.
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    GhostActivity
    Activity that will always be in background but never close until the user shut down the application.
    HistoricActivity
    Activity that show every data collection and survey send to the user on his activities.
    Location
    Class that contains the location informations.
    LocationStorage
    Class that contains the locationManager instance with the mainActivity instance where the locationManager is located.
    LoginActivity
    Activity that allow the user to login by checking if he exists in the database.
    MainActivity
    First activity display.
    NotificationActivity
    Activity that allows user to choose which activity he is doing.
    ParamLocation
    Class that contains the location values of the GPS, like the latitude and the longitude.
    ParamSensors
    Class that contains the sensor values of smartphones.
    PasswordActivity
    Activity that allow us to connect to the admin settings.
    SensorData
    Class that contains the sensors' data.
    SettingsActivity
    Activity that allow the user to change the values of TIME_PARENT and TIME_CHILD in AccountActivity.
    SignupActivity
    Activity that allow the user to register and his informations are stored in the database.
    User
    Class that contains the user informations, stored in the database.
